story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0200_10: Hello everyone! Thank you for coming!
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0300_10:
Today, I’ll be presenting my research on the
mysterious stones discovered on Pasio!
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0400_10:
To start, the official name of these stones has
been decided.
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0500_10: They will be called..."sync stones ultimate"!
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0600_10:
I chose this name because there’s a high
probability these stones contain more power
than ordinary sync stones.
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0700_10:
Much like sync stones, these stones react to the
bond between people and Pokémon, emitting
radiant energy.
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0800_10:
But at the moment, extracting 100% of the power
contained in these stones proves challenging, even
with the best sync pairs.
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_0900_10:
It’s also very difficult to embed the stones into
Poryphones, and it may take a little longer for
everyone to be able to use them.
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_1000_10:
Nevertheless, these stones hold new possibilities
that may strengthen the power and bonds of
sync pairs.
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_1100_10:
So allow us to showcase a snippet of the current
findings from our research!
story_stone_05_02000/2401_1201_1200_10:
I’ll now turn the presentation over to
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Pikachu!
